boardgame.description: From Queen Games website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The whole of Egypt is in uproar _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Akhnaton, who has just acceded to the throne, wants to ban the old deity Amon from the temples of the land. Aton is to be worshiped as the new God._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But the priests of the land are not willing to give up their temples without resistance so the 4 largest temples are fiercely disputed._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The players are adversaries and fight out this battle of the Gods between them. Both have the same starting position, but who will be able to make better use of his abilities and help his God to victory?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: never played +++++ german version, but the game components are completely language independent anyway and you can download various translations from boardgamegeek or queen game´s website +++++ will be shipped insured +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia and australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : direct bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) or cash (by letter) +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly are not cheap (about 19 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped or what´s it´s weight), so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ shipping inside germany costs 8 euros
Game just played once - no wear no tear. Shipping at actual cost dependend on destination, total weight and method of shipment chosen.
Still in shrinkwrap. Direct bank transfer is easily the best payment system. Look for my other games too if you want to bundle a purchase and save on shipping costs.
Brand New!! Still in shrinkwrap. Will ship internationally. Rio Grande Games (RIO 072)

This game is brand new and manufacturer sealed. Combined shipping may be available on multiple purchases. Other shipping arrangements are available upon request but may vary in cost. Pennsylvania shipping addresses should include 6% sales tax.

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. GST _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;/or PST are applicable on all orders depending on your location. Shipping will depend on your location. I will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. Please email me with any questions. Thanks Jason Schill JJSUPERSTORE jason@fadzone.com

Rio Grande Games (RIO 072) Type: Area control Number of players: 2 Age of players: 8+ Length: 30 minutes Game Description: The whole of Egypt is in uproar – Akhnaton, who has just acceded to the throne, wants to ban the old deity Amon from the temples of the land. Aton is to be worshipped as the new God.But the priests of the land are not willing to give up their temples without resistance so the 4 largest temples are fiercely disputed.The players are adversaries and fight out this battle of the Gods between them. Both have the same starting position, but who will be able to make better use of his abilities and help his God to victory? Author: Thorsten Gimmler
German edition by Queen games.

BRANDNEW: I´m offering the German Queen edition. Mint condition (still shrinkwrapped!) All games come from a private collection (non-smoking environment)! Please contact me if you´re looking for more interesting German games as I can offer a lot more. Buyer pays postage, so ask before buying to determine the weight of your desired games! The following payments are welcome: (1) Cash in a registered letter (only Euro accepted) or (2) Chargefree EU Bank-Transfer (using IBAN and SWIFT) or (3) Moneybookers.com (it´s as fast and safe as PayPal but much cheaper: maximum fee is 0.50 EUR) or (4) PayPal (for PayPal payment please add +5 % of the total sum). Have fun playing, Flix! --------------------------------------------- NEW SHIPPING CONDITIONS TO US! PLEASE READ!! --------------------------------------------- I can now send parcels to the US through a friend of mine who is US Army member in Germany. + Cheaper shipping (13,90 EURO for Priority Mail) + including insurance + Much faster delivery (USPS Airmail) = More satisfaction Regular SHIPPING with DHL (=German Post): -------------------------------------------------------- _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 1000 g without insurance (e.g. small cardgames): Europe: EUR 8,00 US/Canada: EUR 10,00 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 2000 g without insurance: Germany: EUR 4,30 EU: EUR 10,00 US/Canada/Rest of Europe: EUR 15,00 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 5 kg with insurance Germany: EUR 7,00 Europe: EUR 19,00 - 32,00 (depending on country) US/Canada: EUR 34,00

Size: Small Standard Information listed on all my For Sale Games: ------------------------------------------------------ 1) Shipping cost is the highest cost of all games purchased + the add on cost of each other game. Promo cards or anything else that fits in a bubble mailer will have a base cost of $5 and and an add on cost of $1, a small game has a base cost of $8 and an add on cost of $2, a medium game has a base cost of $14 and an add on cost of $3 and a large game has a base cost of $20 and add on cost of $4. Anything outside that range will be listed specifically. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re providing a business address to ship to, take a $1 off the shipping. 2) Purchase a $100 or more worth of games and get 5% off your total order. 3) Purchase $200 or more and get 5% off and free shipping. 4) If you see any games on my for trade list that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t up for sale, feel free to ask me to add to the market. 5) Most conditions are listed as very good, all those items listed as such range from very good to like new. 6) Amazon and game store gift cards are usually accepted but please check with me first if that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an option you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to pursue. 7) I try to list editions but if an edition isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t listed and it matters to you, please ask! If an item is bought and another edition was expected but you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ask, then I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to refund but I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t cover either shipping charge.
